argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | lspsn.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | lspsn.k | |- K = ( Base ` F ) |
| 3 |  | lspsn.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 4 |  | lspsn.t | |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) |
| 5 |  | lspsn.n | |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( LSubSp ` W ) = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 7 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 8 | 3, 1, 4, 2, 6 | #P_lss1d | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` F ) = ( 1r ` F ) |
| 10 | 1, 2, 9 | #P_lmod1cl | |- ( W e. LMod -> ( 1r ` F ) e. K ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( 1r ` F ) e. K ) |
| 12 | 3, 1, 4, 9 | #P_lmodvs1 | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. X ) = X ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_eqcomd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> X = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. X ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( k = ( 1r ` F ) -> ( k .x. X ) = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. X ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_eqeq2d | |- ( k = ( 1r ` F ) -> ( X = ( k .x. X ) <-> X = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. X ) ) ) |
| 16 | 15 | #P_rspcev | |- ( ( ( 1r ` F ) e. K /\ X = ( ( 1r ` F ) .x. X ) ) -> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. X ) ) |
| 17 | 11, 13, 16 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. X ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_eqeq1 | |- ( v = X -> ( v = ( k .x. X ) <-> X = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_rexbidv | |- ( v = X -> ( E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) <-> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 20 | 19 | #P_elabg | |- ( X e. V -> ( X e. { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } <-> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 21 | 20 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( X e. { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } <-> E. k e. K X = ( k .x. X ) ) ) |
| 22 | 17, 21 | #P_mpbird | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> X e. { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } ) |
| 23 | 6, 5, 7, 8, 22 | #P_lspsnel5a | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) C_ { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } ) |
| 24 | 7 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> W e. LMod ) |
| 25 | 3, 6, 5 | #P_lspsncl | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 26 | 25 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) |
| 27 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> k e. K ) |
| 28 | 3, 5 | #P_lspsnid | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> X e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 29 | 28 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> X e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 30 | 1, 4, 2, 6 | #P_lssvscl | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ ( N ` { X } ) e. ( LSubSp ` W ) ) /\ ( k e. K /\ X e. ( N ` { X } ) ) ) -> ( k .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 31 | 24, 26, 27, 29, 30 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> ( k .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 32 |  | #P_eleq1a | |- ( ( k .x. X ) e. ( N ` { X } ) -> ( v = ( k .x. X ) -> v e. ( N ` { X } ) ) ) |
| 33 | 31, 32 | #P_syl | |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) /\ k e. K ) -> ( v = ( k .x. X ) -> v e. ( N ` { X } ) ) ) |
| 34 | 33 | #P_rexlimdva | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) -> v e. ( N ` { X } ) ) ) |
| 35 | 34 | #P_abssdv | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } C_ ( N ` { X } ) ) |
| 36 | 23, 35 | #P_eqssd | |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ X e. V ) -> ( N ` { X } ) = { v | E. k e. K v = ( k .x. X ) } ) |
